00029 class simbio_template_parser
00030 {
00031     private $file = ''; // variable to store template name info
00032     private $result = ''; // variable to store template result
00033 
00034 
00041     public function __construct($tpl_file_path)
00042     {
00043         // check if file exists
00044         if (!file_exists($tpl_file_path)) {
00045             die('Template file '.$tpl_file_path.' doesnt exists!');
00046         }
00047 
00048         // check if the template file is HTML or not
00049         if (substr($tpl_file_path, -5) != '.html') {
00050             die('Template file must be HTML file!');
00051         } else {
00052             $this->file = $tpl_file_path;
00053         }
00054 
00055         // reading template file and store it into result properties
00056         if ($tpl_str = file_get_contents($this->file)) {
00057             $this->result = $tpl_str;
00058         } else {
00059            die('<div style="border: 1px solid #FF0000; color: #FF0000;">Template file '.$this->file.' cant be opened!</div>');
00060         }
00061     }
00062 
00063 
00072     public function assign($str_maker, $str_replacement, $bool_show_error = false)
00073     {
00074         if (!preg_match("/".preg_quote($str_maker)."/i", $this->result)) {
00075             if ($bool_show_error) {
00076                 $str_maker = str_ireplace(array('<!--','-->'), '', $str_maker);
00077                 echo "Marker : <b>".htmlentities($str_maker)."</b> doesnt exist in ".$this->file;
00078             }
00079             return;
00080         }
00081         $this->result = str_ireplace($str_maker, $str_replacement, $this->result);
00082         // get any gettext marker
00083         preg_match_all('@<!--__\(.+\)-->@i', $this->result, $_gettext);
00084         if (count($_gettext[0]) > 0) {
00085             foreach ($_gettext[0] as $_trans_mark) {
00086                 $_trans_text = str_replace(array('<!--__(\'','\')-->'), '', $_trans_mark);
00087                 $this->result = str_ireplace($_trans_mark, __($_trans_text), $this->result);
00088             }
00089         }
00090     }
00091 
00092 
00098     public function printOut()
00099     {
00100         echo $this->result;
00101     }
00102 }
00103 ?>
